name: Ascension (Aniki_ta, FlamingMan, neural-operator)
description:
Ascension is a surreal first-person adventure game based on solving puzzles. Heavily inspired by Superliminal, the game incorporates similar gameplay elements.

Plot

A scholar of forbidden arts has finally found the eternal library of eldritch knowledge deep beneath the Range of Madness. These hallways of alien geometry, devoted to All-Mother, are one final and perilous stretch to complete comprehension.

Controls WASDMovement Left Mouse Button InteractShiftRunSpaceJumpCtrlCrouch Credits
  • FlamingMan - Coding, gamedesign
  • aniki-ta - Visuals, gamedesign
  • neural-operator - Additional coding
Third Party Assets ambientCG
Author: Lennart DemesTextures Sci-Industrial Ambience
